THANK YOU FOR VISITING US AT
FINE ART ASIA 2015!
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Celebrate The Birth Of The Finest Cognac With Fine Art
In continuing with our celebration of Martell's 300th Anniversary, you are cordially invited to visit our Martell Tricentenaire Garden at 3812 Contemporary Art Space.
Be a part of this by-invitation-only event to appreciate the 300-bottle art installation by Chinese artist Liu Zhuoquan, while enjoying a complimentary glass of Martell.
Date & Time: 22 October - 13 November 2015, 11:00am - 8:00pm
Location: G/F, 118 Queen's Road West, Hong Kong
Please RSVP below to reserve your place with us.
RSVP <http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/Art-Space_Page-RSVP-landing.html>
